overview: From 2025-10-01 to 2025-11-01, Sendo-labs/plugin-cryptoscore had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: Initial plugin implementation
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Initial implementation of the CryptoScore plugin for ElizaOS
- Token score retrieval functionality
- Wallet scores analysis
- Service integration with CryptoScore API

## Features
- Get token scores by address or symbol
- Get wallet scores and analysis
- LLM-friendly response formatting

topContributors.summary: standujar: This month, standujar's work spanned feature development, bug fixes, and other maintenance tasks. They established a foundational component by merging the initial contributor tracking system in Sendo-labs/leaderboard (#1). Across 26 commits, they made significant code changes, modifying 51 files with over 2,600 new lines added. This activity reflects a primary focus on other work, followed by bug fixes and feature implementation.
